quantify_registration¶

Registration quantification Computes precision, recall, f-measure Mutual information, Superimposes fixed and moving image

quantify_registration.alphanum_key(s)¶
Turn a string into a list of string and number chunks.
“z23a” -> [“z”, 23, “a”]
Parameters:
s: str

a string
Returns:
list

split string
